snippet.title: Danganronpa: Salvation's Fears Teaser
snippet.description:
After a ton of hard work from everybody on our staff team, we finally have something that is not an OST or bloopers! The next big upload should hopefully be the full cast reveal so stay tuned for that! Thank you to everybody involved in the project, both staff and followers, for showing your support for SF! If you'd like more constant updates on our progress, the discord is updated constantly!

All art in this video was done by HeartsBot/The_Hearts_Bot !
All music in this video was done by FQXXY! You can listen to both of the songs used in their entirely on our youtube channel!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OsvJFm9s-7M
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=otbQQY6vejI

*VA's IN THIS VIDEO:*
It is done in order of first appearance!

Nagamori Saemonsaburu: Turgize V.A
CCC(Casting Call Club):
https://www.castingcall.club/turgize
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TurgizeVA
Cardd.co: https://turgize.carrd.co/

Mari Saemonsaburu: HeartsBot
Discord: The_Hearts_Bot#3789 
CCC: https://www.castingcall.club/HeartsBot 

Orange ???: Pastille
Discord: Pastille#2577

Purple ???: ishVA
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVy74XbHrqB8hK-KiFCqUgA
https://ishva.carrd.co

Blue ???: Catster
Discord: Catster#6952

Yellow ???: Raken 
https://linktr.ee/raken23

(Also all sound effects are from the canon DR games!)

Danganronpa: Salvation's Fears is a developing fangan with no affiliation with Spike Chunsoft.

Dangaronpa: Salvation's Fears is set over a decade after the tragedy just as society is returning to normalcy and the events of the past are nothing more than rumors. Just as Hope's Peak Academy is set to reopen their doors, 16 Ultimate Students mysteriously go missing and find themselves fighting for their lives in a killing game.

----------
SOCIAL MEDIA LINKS:
Discord: https://discord.gg/cRHUVnfcnj
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SalvationsFears
